choices: When you wake up...
1.content:
"Wow." You think to yourself. "I actually beat May! She used to always beat me, but for the first time, I got better marks than her. Hmm, Akane still beat me though. Come to think of it, May isn't in the top 5 anymore because of me. Hope she doesn't get mad at me or anything".

You are pretty pleased about your mark in the recent test and can't wait to tell your parents about it. But then again, you remember that there's another test on today and decide to hold the celebration back till later. As the morning bell goes, you quickly head to your roll call, to make sure you aren't late.

When you arrive there, you sigh to yourself, remembering few things about this roll call. One thing you hate about your roll call is that none of your friends are in the same room. So, you don't really have anyone to seat with. Therefore, you always just seat in the back by yourself.

However... There is an upside to make things better. Since you are in the back seat, noone notices you as you eavesdrop or fantasize about May and Akane. Ever since your freshmen years, you always took a like to May and Akane but you never had the heart to tell them how you feel. Not only that, countless boys have asked the two out but they always refused, saying that boys were disgusting. It's no suprise how popular they are. They are both very smart and Akane is even a great Athelete. Like everyday, you decide to eavesdrop on part of their conversation.

You only manage to catch Akane say "May's probably writing her will. Her parents are strict about her marks" to another friend as the bells ring, notifying everyone that the first class is about to start.

"I guess it's test time again," You tell yourself, "I think I will go the long way so I can take some fresh air before the test". By the time you are near your classroom, the hallways are pretty much empty and there are only few students in yoru eyesight.

As you walk along, heading toward your testroom, you hear couple of footsteps running up to you. Before you can turn around, you are knocked forward by none other than Akane and May.

Before you can snarl your anger at them, May giggles "Oops! Sorry Loser!" at you and both of them run off into another hallway. One thing you notice is that your notebook was knocked away from you and has now slided all the way over to a locker. And the second thing you notice is that a girl is getting her books out in front of the locker that your notebook has landed in.

You realise that this is going to look really perverted, so decide to just take the notebook quickly and pretend that it didn't happen. But as you crawl your way over to the notebook, your horomones take over and you can't resist but to look up. The third thing you notice is the nice long legs that rise up to a white lingerie that the girl is wearing.

The fourth thing you notice is the ringing of your ears as the girl feels your presence, turns around and shouts "You!! Pervert!!" and quickly runs off, looking embarassed...

And the last thing you notice is a pink haired girl coming out from around the corner and poiting a wand of some kind at you.

"There!" she tells you. "I hope it works" with not very confident tone.

"You're weird" You quickly insult her.

The girl manages to reply looking a bit flourished "Hmph. Well, I hope you enjoy my little spell, then! See ya later, kid!"

Next thing you know, there's a test paper in front of you and your eyelids feel like couple of rocks. You can't help yourself but to doze off...
1.title: Enjoy my little spell!

choices: Ready to crush you with her book!
Reaching out to grab you! (Alternate Storyline)
Trying to crush you, but you manage to jump off the chair. (Alternate Storyline)
11.content:
The first thing that comes to your mind is...

"W...Where am I? ... What happened? ... Crap. I fell asleep in class... Well, I guess I'm not gonna get as good result as the last one... Wait... What happened to me?! Why is everything so big!? Oh no... This is NOT good! How did this happen?! Am I dreaming?"

Before you can think further, a shadow looms over you. You look up to see the Pink Haired Girl...
11.title: F for Fail

choices: Try and get help from one of the passerby
Head toward one of the girls with an open locker
Explore and try to find the Pink Haired girl
111.content:
You don't even have time to scream as your whole vision is blocked by the front cover of a red book!

"Gotcha!" The Pink Haired girl exclaims as she smacks you mercilessly with her book.

From the damage, you are unable to open your eyes and you start to get afraid if you are now dead. Miracurously, you are able to open your eyes again and when you do so, you realise that you are under the chair that you were seating on a second ago, and that the Pink Haired girl is already leaving the room.

You quickly pull yourself up, and follow her through the door. When you get outside the classroom, you can tell that students are getting ready for next class, as people are moving about in the hallway and others are getting their books from the locker room. You decide to...
111.title: Gotcha!

choices: You fail to dodge the incoming "Bus".
You manage to dodge to the right.
1111.content:
You decide that the first thing you should do, is to find help from someone because at your size, you won't last long. So, because there's no one you know in the hall at the moment, you guess that getting help from a girl is less riskier than getting help from a guy because, guys can be pretty cruel to other small animals, such as yourself...

So you plan out all the story that you are going to tell to the girl that's going to help you. You are going to omit the part about you being a pervert and tell her that somehow a Pink Haired girl made you shrink...

"Here goes nothing" You encourage yourself as you look around, to see who might be suitable. From the stairs to the left, there's a blonde girl coming toward you, with books in her arms. Because of that, she's quite slow and you once again tell yourself that you can pull this off.

You quickly run toward her feet that seem like a bus each, to you, and stop at about 2 metres away from her. Your hopes rise as the girl's expression changes as she notices soemthing moving on the floor. However... The reaction you get is of a total opposite of what you expected...

"Ewww! Bug! I better squish it!" She screams as she raises her right foot over you, balancing on her left foot. This catches you off guard and...
1111.title: Officially Bugged

11111.content:
You desperately try and dive out of the way in an attempt to escape a gruesome death.
However, you were never that good at P.E..

The enormous black shoe manages to descend down on your tiny form. You have no time to scream as the monolithic leather weight pushes you into the floor. You close your eyes, knowing death is imminent.
Indeed it is. The weight pushing down on you is too much to bear and your body is crushed flat under the girl's foot.

The girl examines the bloody mess on the sole of her shoe.
"Ew!" She casually rubs it on the floor, displaying more of your gory remains across the ground. Satisfied with how easily she squished the little bug, the girl walks away, unaware of what she had truly done.

You died. Next time, move faster.
11111.title: You Go Squish Now!

choices: Get steppd on by another passerby
Step on a sticky substance that makes you stop in your track
11112.content: Miraculously you manage to dodge the incoming foot, only to be welcomed by the hard floor. You are managed for a mere second, which gives the girl enough time to start to lift her foot to try and stomp you again. You take a quick look around the area and quickly decide to run under the lockers for safety. You hear a sound of annoyance as the massive foot lands right next to you, making your bones shiver. As you are heading for the sanctuary, you...
11112.title: Head for the Sanctuary

111121.content:
With all the massive and thus extremely loud stomping sounds going on around you whenever someone puts their foot down, you don't seem to notice that you're going partially deaf.

Making your way to the sanctuary, you never hear the massive footsteps behind you, and realise in horror when you turn around that its too late.

You dive foward in an attempt to avoid the unaware student passing by, with no avail. She casually brings her foot down you, crushing everything except your head, which is now seperated from yor body. It rolls away from your life-less non-existent body until it is, too, splattered by a passerby, leaving two massive red stains on the floor.
111121.title: Get steppd on by another passerby

111122.content:
You think to yourself, "This is it! This i really it, I'm really going to die!" But just as the girl is about to slam her foot down ontop of your stuck body, she stops and just stares at you squirming. She bends down and begins to look at you with wide eyes curious as to what kind of bug you are, but just as she does so, one of her friends comes by and steps on your legs crushing your lower body into a bloody splat.

You cry out in pain but to your dismay they arent able to hear you. The blonde girl forgets all about you and begins to talk with her friend. Her friend lifts her foot and reveals yor smushed body on the sole of her shoe. You begin to die and you lay there bleeding out as the blonde girl steps to the side of her friend. As she does so her shoe steps and grinds on the rest of your body, as she walks away she leaves a smear of blood on the floor along with you stuck to her shoe.

Better Luck Next Time

THE END
111122.title: Girlfriends Don't Mess Around

choices: Climb in the bag and get her attention in the next class.
Start Climbing Her legs that seems to go on forever, to you.
Wait for her to be done with packing and follow her afterwards.
1112.content: Getting help would and is one of your main priorities because you are obviously helpless at this size. Looking around, there's a familiar face, or more like familiar back. You haven't talked to her much, but you know that she's in few of your classes like Physics and PE. Anyhow, she's standing up tall and is getting some things out of the locker with her bag on the ground. It's knocked over on to the side so it seems like you could easily climb in. You guess that there's few choices you can take to get her attention...
1112.title: Do I know her?

choices: PE
Biology (Alternate Storyline)
11121.content:
Thinking about other options, you realise that there are so many factors that go against you. For example, what if you fell down while climbing her legs, or what if you couldn't keep up with her, when she was heading for her next class. So you take the least risky option and decide to climb into her open bag and wait it out...

Two things you notice in here. One, it has a lot of junk and whatnot in it, ranging from pencil cases to personal necessities like make up and stuff... Two, it's boring as hell as there's no movement and all you can see outside the bag is the plain old ceiling...

Few mintues pass and the bells ring again. Suddenly the bag starts to move as the girl quickly heads for her next class. You realise that the open end of the bag has many objects and because of that, the floor seems like it's moving. With no choice, you run toward the other side where there's no light but feels as if there's less junk.

By the time the bag stops moving again, what class has the girl gotten to?
11121.title: All Aboard!

choices: You grab on to her socks and climb up to her toes.
Unfortunately, you get knocked back by her toes and get stuck under them.
111211.content:
One another thing you notice on the way to wherever that you were going, was that there was an odd smell that you couldn't quite figure out. Maybe a week old sandwich? Nah. How about...Strong perfume? Nah. Whatever it was, you just couldn't figure it out...

As the journey goes on, you can hear more noises coming from the outside. This continues on until all you can hear are girl's voices, along with some faint noises of footsteps. Not long after that, the bag stops moving and drops rapidly to the ground with a thud. As the bag hits the ground, your world shakes and the things inside are flown about. Next thing you know, you are now in some kind of a cave and the smell from before has got even stronger...

Wondering what class this was, you decide to look up, and automatically you squint and cover your eyes as the light is very bright... By the time you recover... You gasp in horror as you realise just where you are... Your actions of attention are futile as the girl's right foot starts to descend on you. The sheer size of the foot scares you and you instincitvely retreat to the toe end, until you realise that you just cornered yourself even more...

Can you climb on to the top of her toes before she finishes putting her shoes on?
111211.title: Bright Light

choices: Yes, but she thinks you are a bug.
Nope, you have to look for someone else.
1112111.content: Even though that your head feels dizzy from the stench the her shoe's giving off, you somehow manage to grab onto her sweaty socks and climb out of the dark and smelly prison before it's too late. As you make contact with the ground, you turn around, hoping that you were noticed by the girl. Did you?
1112111.title: Quick Climb

choices: Simply kick you away with her sweat soaked sock!
Smash you with her right shoe!
11121111.content: As you make a sound landing and turn around to see what the girl's reaction was, you gain a glimpse of hope as the girl's expression becomes one of a curiousness. You decide to shout something to tell her that you need her help. Before you have the time, the girl starts to look like she is disgusted as she screams "Eww, there was a bug in my shoes?!". This somehow manages to faze you as all your other senses are nulled by the loud noise that rings your ears like crazy. While you are defenseless, the girl decides to...
11121111.title: Yikes!

choices: You were stuck to it, along for another ride...
You were left on the floor of the girl's changing room...
111211111.content:
Your vision is filled with an incoming socked foot as you are helpless to avoid it.

"Oomph" is all you manage to say as the air is knocked out of your lung, while you are pushed along for a ride that you never agreed to. Despite the fact that it's a mere second or two, to you, not only is the pain great, the stench of her sweaty socks seems to fill your nostrils for much longer than that. Once the ride's over, as you bounce off the ground few times, your body feels as if it's been smashed all over. However, to make matters worse, you have no time to pull yourself up, before you can feel the ground vibrate. Knowing what it means, without having to turn around, you gather whatever energy you have left, to n your body against the possible impact.

BOOM! goes the foot as it steps on top of you with deadly precision... However, this time, the socks were definitely sweatier and smellier, as you felt sick to your stomach automatically...

When the foot lifted after less than a second...
111211111.title: "Oomph"

choices: "I Will Finish You Off, Mr. Buggy"
"I Better Add You To My Bug Collection" (Alternate Storyline)
1112111112.content:
You can barely feel your body as you are crushed onto the ground by a girl's foot that was house sized, to you.

After an awkward silence, you hear the girl mumble "... Must be dead... Ewww, I hate bugs! Better leave it as it is...". You are relieved on hearing this and hold your breath, to convince her so. While she starts to walk away, you think to yourself if you really deserve all this, just for peeking up a girl's skirt once... Despite being covered in sweat, dirt and foot odour, you tell yourself that you will probably be restored to normal if you find that Pink haired girl. Just incase there were any other giantesses around, you stay on the ground, playing dead, for few more minutes but you hear no movement. You stand up and take in the surroundings and shudder at just how helpless you are... You, of course, have never been in a girl's locker room before and ain't exactly sure of directions because from what you can tell, it has a different layout to the boy's one.

You guess you better start walking around, because at your size, it could take you half a day to just get from one end of the room to the other, as the locker rooms are pretty large, even at your normal size. You don't even manage to go past a row of lockers, when you hear a door open from nearby. To your surprise and horror, Akane comes running in, panting hard. You wonder what she could have possibly been doing, that she's over 10 minutes late to the class. You soon realise that the real question you should be asking is, whether you can convince her that you aren't a pitiful bug, as all others have assumed you as. To think this through, you duck behind, in one quick motion, away from Akane's eyes.

However, to even a greater horror, you hear Akane shout, "Hey, what was that?" in your direction.

"Please don't let it be me, Please don't let it be me." is all you manage mumble as you start to tremble. Your fears come true as you feel Akane walking toward the locker you are hiding behind. Realising how dangerous this situation is, you start running for your dear life, only to once again be reminded of the worthless exsistence you maintain, as Akane spots you and dashes. In less than two seconds, she covers more ground than you have, in the last ten seconds, blocking your path with her foot. You can't stop in time, and you crash face first into her socked foot. The smell of it dazes you and you fall on your ass for a split second, which leaves you vulernable to the enormus foot.

Akane looks down upon you and smiles smugly. "Heh, a bug, just as I thought. Well..."
1112111112.title: The Late Bird Catches the Worm?!

choices: Akane flattens you underneath her socked foot
The other girls in the locker room notice you.
11121111121.content:
Akane grins wider.
"I guess that all bugs..."
She lifts a foot high in the air, and you pale.
No.
She couldn't!
Akane continues.
"All bugs deserve to be crushed."
She is!
Akane is going to crush you!!
You scramble to your feet and immediatly run in the other direction.

What happens?
11121111121.title: "I Will Finish You Off, Mr. Buggy"

111211111211.content:
As you sprint across the floor of the changeroom, Akane begins to lower her foot.

You see the shadow pass over you.
And keep running.

You hear the slight whistling of air as Akane's massive socked foot flies through the air, towards you.
And keep running.

Suddenly, you trip on a small crack in the floor and land face-first on the floor. You look up at your approaching doom.
Akane's enormous foot slams down on top of you, forcing your body against the ground, pulverizing you completly.
She lifts her foot off of the ground and smirks.
"Got it."
With that, Akane spins on her heel and walks away, leaving a red smear on the bottom of her sock and on the floor.
111211111211.title: Akane flattens you underneath her socked foot

111211111212.content: the only thing your running on is adrinaline and excitement, but others has come to help her kill you. you think the more that come the better.
111211111212.title: The other girls in the locker room notice you.

choices: keep looking for the pink hair girl
1112111112121.content: To you this is like dodge ball, but instead of ball there are girls who are trying to kill you. you are still running on adrinaline and the excitement. some of the girls are tireing out while others find the energy to keep going. when there is a pause in the confrontation you are hardly tired while they are tinking of a way to kill you they try a last ditch effort to kill you. they all try to kill you altogethere, but with you hardly tired you back up a couple ou steps and they miss. you say this is geting boring you run down the hall leaving the girls tired and out of breath. what to do now?
1112111112121.title: you dodge them all and escape

choices: Pink Haired Girl
Goth Science Teacher
11121111121211.content:
You manage to escape from the change room and run outside. You still have almost full stamina left, so you're good to go. In the main hallway, you stick to the sides and run ahead. With everything now appearing huge, you can hardly recognize the area.

Thinking back, the pink-haired girl had a magic wand, and since magic supposedly doesn't exist, you can only assume that she used some sort of science related trick on you, and the underground school Lab is the only place with such equipment. You decide to go down there.

You make your way to the stairs to the lab without been seen, it gets pretty easy when you're that small. At the bottom of the stairs, you are stopped by a closed door. You'll never be able to open it yourself like this. As if someone heard your thoughts, the door opens, and out comes...

Who appears from the door?
11121111121211.title: keep looking for the pink hair girl

choices: Playing Deadly Games With Them
Conducting Experiments on Them
11121111122.content:
"I Better Add You To My Bug Collection" Akane says as she plucks you off the ground with her thumb and point finger. You try to wriggle out of her grip, despite the fact that it's futile to resist. As you are brought to Akane's face, you can make out all these tiny blemishes and scratches on her face, that are probably invisible, if you were your original size.

"Hmm, you sure are an odd looking bug," Akane tells you, "I think you will be happy with me, heh". You only realise then, that you should be trying to communicate with her before it's too late! You scream your lungs out and even wave at her, but she is looking through her bag at the moment, with her other free hand.

"You know what, Buggy?" Akane says in an odd tone, still searching through the bag. "I will let you in on a little secret, heh". You do not care very much about this "secret" of hers and you just hope that she turns around already and realises that she's holding her fellow classmate!

"The thing is, well, not many people know this, so you musn't tell anyone, heh" giggles Akane, "I collect bugs, much like yourself, as pets because, I find them very fun to play with". You wonder if you have the worst luck in the world, as your hope of being rescued just became almost nothing.

You realise you do have the worst luck as Akane pulls out a glass jar with small enough holes for air to come in, but not big enough for you to get out. "There, am I prepared or what?" Akane says cheerfully. From what you can see, Akane's really glad about this, because she doesn't even bother taking a good look at you, as she drops you in the jar and tells you to just hold on tight, till she gets home. As Akane finishes zipping the bag back up, it becomes dark and you can't make out anything but the cold glass surface and wall.

Few times throughout the day, Akane pulls out a book and so on, but beside that, it is pretty uneventful, except one time when from your perspective, it was the biggest earthquake ever, as someone apparently bumped into Akane's bag...

As the end of the day bell rings, you wonder what it's like at Akane's house, and drift off to sleep...

When you wake up, it is silent and there is no movement, as far as you can tell. Neither is there any light. Little do you know, you are already at Akane's house and she is coming downstairs at that exact moment to take you upstairs.

First, you hear the thumps along the ground. Then, you hear the zipper being opened, and next, comes the blindness from the bright light. Finally, the world being turned upside down as you are dumped out of the jar into Akane's sweaty hands.

"Heh, I wonder if bugs sleep?" Akane asks no one in particular. "Anyway, I hope you last longer than the other ones." You wonder if Akane really likes bugs, and also if there's any chance that she realises you are a human being.

"We should start playing, right away!" Akane says as she encloses you within her palms, cutting off all the light and heading upstairs to her bedroom.

You are oblivious to the fact that Akane plays with her bugs by...
11121111122.title: Your New Life As Nothing More Than Akane's Pet(AS)

curel torture

choices: Sweaty Armpit
Left Stinky Blue Sock on the Ground
111211111222.content:
As Akane gets to her room, she closes the in one quick motion and locks it right after. "Finally, chance for us to play, heh. I bet you've been waiting for this moment buggy." Akane tells you, despite the fact that she thinks you are just a bug. You wonder why she's so passionate about bugs...

"Well, as you may know already, I had PE class today, and we had to play soccer out in the sun!" Akane exclaims, as she showed sign of frustration. "Even though I'm so fit, it was tremendous effort." she adds, as she brings you close and takes another good look at you.

"Honestly, I have never seen a bug like you." she comments. This whole time, you were waving and trying to get her to hear your voice but it seems to be ineffective.

"Oh yeh, just the other day, I read that bugs are attracted to chemicals like alcohol and sweat... Wonder if it's true..." Akane says, as she puts you down on her bed and starts to strip to her underwear. "Pee yew" Akane says as her sweat odour from her armpits and feet are released into the open air of the bedroom. "What did I tell you. Those PE lessons sure take it out of you".

First thing you notice, is that you just got turned on, as you never seen this much skin of a girl before, disregarding the fact that she's bigger than a mountain compared to you. Second thing is, that you can only agree with her as you feel nausea and can't believe that such a smart and fit girl like her can smell this bad. "Hmm, I think I should do a quick experiment before I have a shower," Akane ponders to herself.

While you wonder what is going on in her head, you don't react fast enough to Akane's lightning fast grip as she lifts you between her thumb and the point finger, only to carry you to her...
111211111222.title: Experiment #1. Do bugs like Sweat?

choices: Akane takes you out, she wants to play a game of "lover bug"
Your still in Akane's pit
1112111112221.content:
While you wonder what is going on in her head, you don't react fast enough to Akane's lightning fast grip as she lifts you between her thumb and the point finger, only to carry you to her left armpit. To your horror, you can smell and almost taste the humid sweaty environment that is within Akane's left armpit. You are practically glued as soon as you touch the wet surface. I'mt was terrible, especially when you first hit the wet skin. Then darkness fell on you. You were trapped in the pit of despair, and the stench was more then you could handle. You can't believe how hot it is inside her pit. The skin is like trying to keep balance on a water bed, only this time it smells terrible, and is hot and sticky. You struggle to free yourself.

"Ohhh, that tickles, buggy!" snickers Akane.

You groan, Akane still couldn't tell you were human and not some bug. Your struggling and the humid environment takes its toll on you and you pass out.

When you regain consciousness...
1112111112221.title: Sweaty Armpit (AS)

choices: Listen To Your Brain! Get Out!
Stay Put! You Need to Save Energy!
1112111112222.content:
Your vision is blurred by the sheer speed that the hand is moving and you are clueless as where abouts you are heading to. A mere second after the moving stops, you are thrown into an area where you immidiately notice that the air is much thicker , withouth even taking in a sniff or a blink. However, when you crash land, and gasp for air, there were no doubts about where you were. It smelt, felt and tasted just like it was before, except much stronger. You were definitely in one of Akane's socks that she wore to play Soccer in the afternoon. You don't dare open your eyes, as your face was covered in her still warm sweat, and getting them into your eyes could be fatal.

"Ok, from this moment on, I shall start the experiment, "Do bugs really enjoy the smell of Sweat?" you manage to pick up, despite the fact that it's muffled out to some extent. "I wonder if three mintues is enough to make sure that the experiment is valid, heh. Do your best buggy, and even if you don't, don't get disappointed so much, I always repeat my experiment to increase their realiability!" Akane assures you through the fabric.

You are horrored by the fact that Akane is using you as some kind of a lab rat for some stupid and childish experiment! Your brain is constantly alarming you to get out of this hell, so you decide to open your eyes and run for the exit. When you do, you wish you hadn't as you notice that the walls of the sock are stained like someone puked on it. All... Over... The... Sock, that is... You remove it from your mind and look around, figuring out the exit and running towards it. However, your foot quickly becomes stuck to the sock material as it is almost as if you were running in mud, as your foot was sinking in constantly, flying bits of sweat in every direction, including your eyes and mouth.

"One minutes to go" Akane exclaims, not talking to anyone in particular. You wonder if there's any point in getting out, because, as she said, you might have to repeat the experiment, meaning you will be put right back in... Do you bother trying to get out, or just cringe your nose and stay put?
1112111112222.title: Running in the... Mud?

choices: continue
11121111122221.content: Your stupid brain's right, GET OUT!!
11121111122221.title: Listen To Your Brain! Get Out!

She puts you somewhere else sweaty...
111211111222211.content:
A simple though runs through your brain as you make your escape, “Get out, it freakin’ stinks in here”

With the cheesy smell of Akane’s foul foot sweat you make a make dash towards the opening at the end of the sock. The sticky floor at your feet slowed you tremendously, but eventually you managed to prevail. As you step out into the bright light, you look up to see Akane staring down at you with a look of minor surprise on her face.

“Wow, the book might be wrong, “ Proclaims the blue-haired titaness, “But I guess I should repeat the experiment to double check” She decided to your horror.

How does Akane proceed with the experiment?
111211111222211.title: Escape from Akane's Smelly Sock

"Have you heard the one about the Rabbi and the drunk Iman?"
11221221.content: You decided to throw caution to the wind and sprinted all out for the end of the shoe and you heard the gym teacher say...
11221221.title: Try to escape

112212211.content: You heard her say this and think nothing of it until her foot lands squarly on top of you and the entire stench, sweat, and weight of the socked foot hits you in the face and you pass out, never to wake up
112212211.title: "I have to get to my next class, bye!"

choices: Class is over and is breaktime
Empty Hall
112212212.content:
As you get to the end of Miss Kelly's trainer you hear her tell a joke to one of the other teachers. You grab a bit of the sock and started to climb out of her shoe. You got out just in as Miss Kelly goes to her class and you jumped off.

You looked around the staffroom and see the door open. You run through when...
112212212.title: Out of the Shoe...?

11221222.content:
By now you have been stepped on by god knows how many people and have decided to just sit there and die. Mrs. Kelly seemed happy to oblige. "I have a free period that I'm going to the gym in a while, wanna come with?", she said to the other teacher sitting next to her. "Sure!" said Mrs. Kelly. Her foot slammed into her trainer and you almost lose consciousness but you stay awake until she starts running laps with her friend in the gym.



Mrs. Kelly found a strange red stain on her sock that night.
11221222.title: Don't try you have accepted your fate

choices: Akane!
11222.content:
"To gym class. I'm gonna be late if I don't hurry." Your ears perk up once you hear the word gym. Gym, a place where all girls can run around half naked in sports bras and short shorts without being watched by boys. It was perfect. This "punishment" was going better than expected.

"Okay," is all you can manage to say though.

Both of you stay in silence for a while. All you can hear is the squeaky sounds the pink haired girl's shoes made as they hit the ground with each step she took. "What are you thinking?" She asks you as she opens the door to high school. You aren't inside the changing room yet though, its a floor down and a long walk. The building reeks of pool water, and somehow distracts you, making you say the worst possible thing.

"Boobs." It was the truth.

She just shook her head at the response and pursed her lips. "God, you really are a pervert. I guess I underestimated you." Silence. "Actually, I didn't. Coming from you, I would expect a reply like that."

"C'mon, it was a joke! I'm not that big of a perv," you lie.

She snorts as she pulls open the door to the changing room.

"Yeah right."

You go silent as you see other girls changing, their boobs hanging out of the bras, their tight asses hanging out of their thongs. You nearly faint from overload of the scenery, but decide not to since you'd miss the show if you did. You turn around and see...
11222.title: Enormus Pool

choices: Explore
Run away!
112221.content:
Akane was talking to May, the pink haired girl walked up closer to where they were sitting and put you on the chair. You are amazed by this show of girls showing off there boobs. There was one problem though the huge purse that you were in blocked your view. You look around for something to help you get out of this purse. You find a pack of gum that looks light enough to push up. Then you here somebody say something as you begin to push.

"What are we doing today after school?"

This sounds like Akane.

"I have a alot of homework as it is so I can't hang out later."

Somthing that May would have said.

You did it, the pack of gum is at a angle so that you can climp up and get out of there. Then you here somebody tell the girls to go into the gym. The pink haired girl leaves you behind in the purse. You climb out and the locker room is empty. What do you do?
112221.title: Akane!

choices: She starts jogging, anything could happen.
The girls do warmups, jumping jacks and push-ups.
1122212.content:
You begin your descent down the purse of your captor, but just as you think you're free, something terrible happens that sends chills down your spine.

"Hang on I left something in my bag" The pink haired girl says.

You panic, and attempt to run behind the purse in hopes of avoiding eye contact with the girl.
However your efforts are fruitless, as a large shadow appears above you shortly before you find yourself picked up and rising up high into the air.

"So that's how it is huh? I try to teach you a lesson, but you just don't want to learn do you?" she says
"No wait, I can explain -" you say as she cuts you off
"No no, don't bother, I understand." she answers
You start to lighten up in hopes that maybe you've convinced her you're not such a bad guy after all, however...

"I understand.. that you were planning on peeping on all these other girls. How dare you, do you even know why I shrank you in the first place??" she asks angrily
"I would never do that I swear" you plead
"I think you need to be punished mister." she grins "You know earlier, you said you were thinking about boobs. Well I'll give you all the time in the world to think about them, and hopefully, this time you learn something from what's about to happen."

She begins to lower you down to chest level. Her enormous breasts in full view. You gulp.
"uh oh" you say

She unzips the front of her uniform until it reaches the middle of her breasts. As she brings you into her chest, all you can focus on is the amazing cleavage in-front of you.

"And don't you dare think about running away this time" she says one final thing before she drops you down between her breasts.

Only your shoulders and head stick out from above her breasts as she zips her uniform back up and starts to head outside to track. Everywhere your hands reach out to, all you can find is soft flesh. Blanketed in darkness, you feel the heavy ripples and jiggling of her huge breasts around you as she moves about her business, every slight motion heaving her breasts onto your small body. Her smell is so intoxicating, so much that you begin to wonder if you'll withstand suffocating in here, let alone the fact that these ginormous jugs just may end up crushing you.
1122212.title: Failed getaway

info.brief_description: Based off the Shrinking game by Pogojo. See inside to find out where to download it.
info.description:
With permission from Pogojo... I present you, "Shrink School", Interactive Style...



This interactive story is based off the recent GTS genred game made by Pogojo. More information about the game can be found here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji6q3WaOsx8


Since the game is only demo, more characters will be introduced, as well as changes to character profiles.





Characters:

You:

A hard-working student who is very shy with other girls. You have a somewhat perverted side, and that have got you into this predicament where you were shrunk to a bug size.


Pink Haired Girl (Name Unknown):

A pink haired girl who seems as if she's unsure of her capabilities with her magic. She carries around a pink heart shaped wand, and with it, has shrunk you to punish you for perving on another girl.


Akane:

Blue haired girl, who seems very carefree and fit. She sometimes looks down on people by calling them "Loser".

May:

A brunette girl who has parents that expect a lot out of her, as she is irritated and depressed by the fact that she didn't go so good in the recent test.


Miss (Name Unknown)




Please do not add to the story for now, as I will be adding to it.

Rules:
Proper Grammar
No other introduction of Characters
Others must think that you are a bug, or some kind of toy (Excludes: Akane, May or the Pink Haired girl)
A Normal person cannot hear what you are saying (Excludes: The Pink Haired girl)
